name: Ghost and the Machines (10 Games in 10 Weeks)
name_original: Ghost and the Machines (10 Games in 10 Weeks)
description:
Ghost and the Machines is a tower defense game with a twist:  you take direct control of each of your robots!

Pilot your machines, and when you leave the cockpit, they will continue to do what you had them doing last.  Set them up in clever ways to create a delicate balance between destroying attackers, gathering resources, and forming barriers!

This is the fourth entry into my 10 Games in 10 Weeks challenge.  Follow me on Twitter for daily progress updates!
